articles.title: Amazon nations fail to agree on a common goal to end deforestation - CNN
articles.description: Eight South American countries failed to agree on a common goal to save the critically vulnerable Amazon from deforestation following a landmark summit in Brazil Tuesday, a concerning outcome as the world’s largest rainforest acts as a key buffer against the …
